name: gist-gemini-fancy
description: Proof of concept to explore fancy conflict resolution for images

scripts.gemini-update: npm run verify-webdriver-running && gemini update test.js
scripts.gemini-test: npm run verify-webdriver-running && gemini test test.js
scripts.verify-webdriver-running: curl --silent http://localhost:4444/ > /dev/null || (echo "Webdriver isn't running, please start it via \`npm run webdriver-start\`" 1>&2 && exit 1)

author: Todd Wolfson <todd@twolfson.com> (http://twolfson.com/)
